website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak Pixpro SL10 adds a 10x zoom lens to your Android or iOS smartphone, but it's a bit awkward to use.
pros: Good image quality at higher ISOs
cons: Slow to lock focus and fire

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on or off phone. Works to about 50 yds with tablet, less with a phone. Resolution is great! Cons- extremely laggy when taking any kind of pic. No close up macro mode Battery doesn't last very long and can't use while charging. No flash.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works great and takes great shots. Loved the cell phone holder feature. When mounted to a cell phone, looks like a real professional camera. Also tripod mount is very useful to take photos remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Emrah S.

customer_reviews.title: I do love the concept however
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to function as promised, however the one thing that makes me crazy about any camera is any delay between pressing the shutter release and the actual capture of the picture. it reminded me of the first Sony DSLR I owned when I took a photo if i didn't keep the camera perfectly still the delay would result in a big blur. I do love the concept however.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Kuster

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this product too much, yet, but plan on it in the spring. So far, very interesting. Can be a little slow and awkward, having to use phone or tablet along with it, but works great on a tripod. Will know more. Seller was great! Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Couch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When attached to an S6 edge, takes pictures half the quality of the on board camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but poor app
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok, but the app was to slow and needs more features.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: The picture didn't look any better than taking it with your iphone without the lens
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this because the camera was delayed and took to long to take a picture. The picture didn't look any better than taking it with your iphone without the lens.
customer_reviews.author: T and T's mom

customer_reviews.title: The lens its amazing, I got it on time
customer_reviews.text: The lens its amazing, I got it on time, the app need to be improved but it works, great product, even at night its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Hate this
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with SD card, takes only a few photos before running out of memory. Bought a SanDisk micro SDXC but does not seem to work with Pixpro. No user manual, have to download it from online but it does not give much instruction. Very frustrating to get it to work. Great idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea but very limited usability.
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea but slow and awkward to use. Shutter lag is almost 1 second greatly limits usability. Fine for landscapes and still lifes but don't even think about shooting anything moving. Lousy in low light. Seems to do better with video than still photos. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: da_musicman

customer_reviews.title: Very slow in capturing images
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a earlier review for the white color one but, I want people to know my experiences with this product. This camera does take decent pictures in daylight but, it's very slow capturing images. It doesn't catch up to the subject, lags. I wanted this attachment to be better than my cell phone's camera but, since it's too slow, didn't work out for me. Also it cropped my pics when I tried to share it on media, very strange and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: I would hold out for something better.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this as a convenience so that I could stop lugging around my camera. I am so disappointed in this product. It drains power quickly. Very quickly. And although the pictures are high quality, I cannot take pictures of things in motion. Stand stills/landscape/portraits are great but any motion and it's a blur. I can take 10 pictures and it zaps 1/2 of my battery. I would not recommend this because it's so expensive for a not so great product. I would hold out for something better.
customer_reviews.author: amy r. greene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to connect to my phone and no one answers the support line.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt wotk with new iphone operating system 9.1 or above
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it the camera worked great. I have not had a need to use it for some time. Now I am trying to get the app for my new iPhone 6s and Sony hasn't upgraded their software to work with the apple software iOS 9.2. the IPhone 6 has been out for over a year
customer_reviews.author: eardds

product_meta.title: Kodak SL10 PIXPRO Smart Lens for Camera - Black
product_meta.description:
Your smart phone just got a whole lot better. Introducing the new KODAK SL10 Smart Phone Lens designed to take your smart phone to new heights. Mega zoom meets mega cool. Highly portable, easy to attach and wireless for the ultimate in exhibition. Your camera photos have never looked so good. 

Snap into a brand new perspective. Every day there are ample opportunities to snap and share, but our phone cameras often fall short when delivering really crisp, clear, and up close photos until now. The KODAK SL10 Smart Lens Camera changes all that and turns your device into the next generation of cameras.

BOX CONTAINS
SL10, AC Adapter, Wrist Strap, Micro USB, User Guide

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
